preqs: Chinese introductory 2 or equivalent or permission

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed a unit in {ATS1002, ATS2002} or  Permission required)
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1002, ATS2002}

(Must have passed 1 units in {ATS1906, CHI%020, CHI%030, CHI%040, CHI%050, CHI%060, CHI%070, CHI%080, CHI%090, CHI%100, CHI%110, CHI%120, CHI%902, CHI%903, CHI%904, CHI%905, CHI%906, CHI%907, CHI%908, CHI%909, CHI%910, CHI%911, CHI%912, CHI1220} OR  Permission required)

Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1002, ATS1003, ATS1004, ATS1005, ATS1006, ATS1007, ATS1008, ATS1009, ATS1010, ATS1011, ATS1012, ATS1022, ATS1023, ATS1024, ATS1025, ATS1026, ATS1027, ATS1028, ATS1029, ATS1030, ATS1031, ATS1032, ATS1906, ATS2002, ATS2003, ATS2004, ATS2005, ATS2006, ATS2007, ATS2008, ATS2009, ATS2010, ATS2011, ATS2012, ATS2022, ATS2023, ATS2024, ATS2025, ATS2026, ATS2027, ATS2028, ATS2029, ATS2030, ATS2031, ATS2032, ATS3005, ATS3006, ATS3007, ATS3008, ATS3009, ATS3010, ATS3011, ATS3012, ATS3023, ATS3024, ATS3025, ATS3026, ATS3027, ATS3028, ATS3029, ATS3030, ATS3031, ATS3032}

description: This unit will introduce students to key concepts used in the study of modern China and to academic writings on modern China in English and in English translation. It will cover a range of topics on Chinese culture, history and politics as these are discussed and written about in English and Chinese. It will also examine and compare Chinese and Western styles of academic writing and research methods. Questions of cultural translation are central to this unit.
